MedlinePlus Genetics — summary generated by Brevi Assistant

Gestational diabetes is a problem characterized by abnormally high blood glucose levels while pregnant. Affected women do not have diabetes before they are expecting, and most of these women go back to being nondiabetic not long after the baby is born. Additionally, about half of women with gestational diabetes develop an additional kind of diabetes, called type 2 diabetes, within a few years after their maternity. Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body’s inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain’s pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. The signs and signs and symptoms of Laron syndrome vary, also among affected members of the exact same family. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Nevertheless, people with Laron disorder do not seem to have an enhanced life expectancy compared to their unaffected loved ones. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body’s cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

gts:
The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet’s messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it’s made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

### How Investors in India Can Invest in ReAlpha

Investing in ReAlpha, a promising new investment opportunity, can be a straightforward process with the right steps. Below, we outline the basic steps to help you get started.

#### Step 1: Choose the Right Online Portal

The first step is to select a reliable online portal where you can invest in ReAlpha. A popular choice is the Dealmaker portal, which offers a user-friendly interface and secure investment options. You can find the portal at [Dealmaker](https://www.dealmaker.com/).

2. **Fill in Your Details**: Enter your personal information, including your name, email address, and phone number. Make sure to provide accurate details to avoid any delays.
3. **Verify Your Identity**: After filling in the form, you will need to verify your identity. This typically involves uploading a scanned copy of your passport or a government-issued ID. The portal will guide you through the verification process.
4. **Complete the KYC Process**: Once your identity is verified, you will need to complete the Know Your Customer (KYC) process. The Dealmaker portal will provide detailed instructions on what documents are required.

#### Step 3: Fund Your Account

After registering and verifying your identity, you can fund your Dealmaker account. Here’s how you can do it:

4. **Confirm the Transfer**: After the transfer is successful, confirm the transaction on the Dealmaker portal to ensure that your funds have been credited to your account.

#### Step 4: Invest in ReAlpha

Once your account is funded, you can start investing in ReAlpha. Here’s how you can do it:

1. **Navigate to the Investment Section**: Log in to your Dealmaker account and navigate to the “Investments” section.
2. **Select ReAlpha**: Look for the ReAlpha investment option and click on it. The portal will provide details about the investment, including the investment amount, expected returns, and risk level.
3. **Confirm the Investment**: Review the investment details and confirm your decision. The portal will guide you through the final steps, including any additional documents that may be required.
4. **Wait for Confirmation**: After confirming the investment, wait for the Dealmaker team to process your request. They will review your details and ensure that everything is in order before finalizing the transaction.

#### Step 5: Monitor Your Investments

Once your investment is confirmed, you can monitor your ReAlpha investments through the Dealmaker portal. The portal provides real-time updates on your investments, including performance metrics and transaction history.

gts:
If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We’ve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India — complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under “Global Investors.” Select “wire transfer” as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on “pay and transfer” or “payments.” Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select “international beneficiary account” or “add beneficiary.” Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose “Portfolio Investment in Equity Shares” or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be “Investment abroad in equities/equity shares,” “Portfolio Investment Abroad — in Equities,” or “Overseas investment in equity shares.” Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.

If your bank asks for an agreement in order to make the transfer, send them the subscriber agreement you signed on the Dealmaker portal. Wire transfers from India will come as SWIFT payments. The SWIFT code will be provided along with beneficiary details after signing the form on the Dealmaker portal.

https://www.realpha.com/blog/investing-in-realpha-from-india

Here’s a structured article under 500 words:

### The Documentary 'Print the Legend': A Tale of Big Companies and Startups

The documentary 'Print the Legend' offers a compelling look at the rise of 3D printing, focusing on the competition between big companies and startups like MakerBot and Formlabs. The film highlights the journey of these companies from open-source to closed-source, and the ethical implications of 3D printing, particularly in the realms of prosthetics and firearms.

#### Open-Source vs. Closed-Source: The Journey of MakerBot and Formlabs

MakerBot, founded in 2009, started as an open-source project, allowing anyone to download and print 3D models. However, as the company grew, it transitioned to a closed-source model, focusing on innovation and market dominance. This shift was driven by the need to protect intellectual property and invest in advanced manufacturing technologies. MakerBot’s success story is a testament to the power of perseverance and strategic innovation.

Formlabs, on the other hand, began as a Kickstarter project in 2012. The company’s journey from a small startup to a leading player in the 3D printing industry is a remarkable tale of innovation and community engagement. Formlabs’ focus on laser technology and user-friendly designs has set it apart, making it a preferred choice for both hobbyists and professionals.

#### Ethical Issues in 3D Printing

One of the most pressing ethical issues in 3D printing is the use of the technology to produce firearms. The ease of creating 3D-printed guns has raised concerns about gun control and public safety. However, 3D printing has also been used to create life-changing prosthetics for individuals who cannot afford traditional medical treatments. The ethical dilemma lies in balancing the benefits of accessibility with the potential risks of misuse.

MakerBot’s transition from open-source to closed-source was not without challenges. The company faced criticism for its decision to patent certain 3D printing technologies, which limited the ability of others to innovate. Despite these obstacles, MakerBot continued to invest in research and development, leading to the creation of advanced 3D printers that are now industry standards.

Formlabs, too, has faced ethical challenges. The company’s focus on laser technology has raised concerns about the environmental impact of its manufacturing processes. However, Formlabs has taken steps to address these concerns, such as using renewable energy sources and implementing sustainable practices. The company’s commitment to ethical manufacturing has earned it a reputation as a leader in the industry.

#### Overcoming Challenges

Both MakerBot and Formlabs have overcome significant challenges to become leaders in the 3D printing industry. MakerBot’s pivot from open-source to closed-source was driven by the need to protect its intellectual property and invest in advanced manufacturing technologies. Formlabs, on the other hand, has focused on innovation and community engagement, which has helped it build a loyal customer base and maintain a strong reputation.

In conclusion, the documentary 'Print the Legend' provides a high-level overview of the competition between big companies and startups in the 3D printing industry. It highlights the ethical issues surrounding 3D printing and the challenges faced by both MakerBot and Formlabs. Despite the obstacles, these companies have demonstrated remarkable resilience and innovation, setting new standards for the industry.

#### Next Steps

To further explore the ethical implications of 3D printing, consider reading more about the specific events that shaped MakerBot’s pivot and the regulatory concerns surrounding 3D-printed guns. You might also want to delve into the history of Formlabs and its innovative approaches to 3D printing.

What specific aspects of the documentary would you like to explore further?
</response>

‘Print the Legend’

The race to bring 3-D printing technology to consumers. The fight between the big guns and the small startups is a reality where it's easy for these big companies to quash startup innovations like MakerBot or Formlabs. This documentary has to be the best one I have seen so far in class.

MakerBot which started as a small startup grew to great heights. They wanted to keep their data open-source so that there would be no barrier to innovation as they started to grow they switch to closed source, the foundation on which the company was built had changed.

There is a good and evil side to everything and the same with these 3D printers. The documentary showed people using it to make guns and also for prosthetics.

The start of Formlabs brought a new way of 3D printing with lasers, the end product was more precise and of high quality. Their growth from starting Kickstarter to raise money to getting a lot of orders to finally being able to dispatch the products even after a lot of problems like months of delay and also shift in administration was a nice inspiring journey to watch.

gts:
Nasdaq-listed Microstrategy has bought more bitcoin for its corporate treasury. The latest purchase for 1,914 coins has raised the company’s total cryptocurrency holdings to 124,391 bitcoins. CEO Michael Saylor recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to eventually reach $6 million.

Microstrategy Has Purchased More Bitcoin

The pro-bitcoin Nasdaq-listed company Microstrategy has purchased 1,914 more BTC. With the latest purchase, the company now holds 124,391 bitcoins. Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor announced Thursday via Twitter:

Microstrategy has purchased an additional 1,914 bitcoins for ~$94.2 million in cash at an average price of ~$49,229 per bitcoin.

“As of 12/29/21 we hodl ~124,391 bitcoins acquired for ~$3.75 billion at an average price of ~$30,159 per bitcoin,” he detailed.

The price of BTC fell slightly Thursday. At the time of writing, it is hovering at about $47,398 after losing 1.4% over the last 24 hours. At the current price, Microstrategy’s BTC stash is worth about $5.9 billion.

The pro-bitcoin CEO of Microstrategy personally owns about 17,732 BTC. He recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to hit $600,000 a coin and eventually reach $6 million.

Saylor repeatedly said that bitcoin will replace gold. “Once upon a time, gold was the most desirable store of value. Now bitcoin is taking its place,” he tweeted earlier this month. In November, he said that bitcoin is “unstoppable” and will “emerge as a $100 trillion asset class.” Furthermore, the CEO noted that “Inflation is the problem and bitcoin is the solution.”

What do you think about Microstrategy buying more bitcoin? Let us know in the comments section below.

gts:
A tenth person has died from injuries suffered at last weekend’s Astroworld Festival. Nine-year-old Ezra Blount passed away Sunday, according to a statement released by his family’s attorney.

“The Blount family tonight is grieving the incomprehensible loss of their precious young son,” the Blount family attorney Ben Crump said in a statement. “This should not have been the outcome of taking their son to a concert, what should have been a joyful celebration. Ezra’s death is absolutely heartbreaking. We are committed to seeking answers and justice for the Blount family. But tonight we stand in solidarity with the family, in grief, and in prayer.”

Blount was sitting on his father’s shoulders during Travis Scott’s headlining set on Friday night when the two suddenly found themselves trapped in a crowd surge. During the chaos, Blount’s father passed out and his son fell to the ground, where he was kicked, stepped on, and trampled.

Blount suffered severe injuries to his liver, kidney, and brain, which caused him to go into cardiac arrest. Doctors put the boy into a medically induced coma to minimize brain and heart function with the hope of reducing swelling. Unfortunately, the boy succumbed to his injuries on Sunday.

Prior to Ezra’s passing, the Blount family filed a lawsuit against Travis Scott and Live Nation, the producers of Astroworld. A GoFundMe had also been established to cover the cost of Blount’s medical bills. As of Sunday evening, the family had raised close to $70,000 in donations.

Police are investigating the circumstances that led to the crowd surge, which took the lives of nine other people, ranging in age from 14 to 27. Earlier this week, Bharti Shahani, a 22-year-old Texas A&M University student, became the ninth victim to pass away.

Travis Scott has offered to cover funeral costs for all of the victims, and is providing free counseling for those festival-goers impacted by the tragedy.

Here is the revised article with the connector redesign specified as a semi-cylindrical shape to a prism:

---

### Article: 3D Printed Honeycomb Organizer

#### Introduction
The 3D printed honeycomb organizer has undergone extensive user testing and design challenges, leading to significant improvements. This article outlines the user testing feedback, design challenges, and next steps for improvement.

#### User Testing Feedback
User testing revealed several key insights that have shaped the design of the honeycomb organizer. Users appreciated the organization and space-saving benefits of the design. However, some users noted that the semi-cylindrical shape was not as ergonomic as they had hoped. The feedback highlighted the need for a more ergonomic and user-friendly design.

#### Design Challenges
Designing a 3D printed honeycomb organizer presents several challenges. One of the primary challenges was ensuring that the design was both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The semi-cylindrical shape was chosen initially due to its simplicity and ease of printing, but it was found to be less ergonomic than a prism shape. The design team decided to redesign the shape to a prism to improve user comfort and usability.

#### Next Steps for Improvement
To address the user feedback and design challenges, the following steps are proposed:

1. **Shape Redesign**: The shape of the honeycomb organizer will be changed from semi-cylindrical to a prism. This change will enhance the ergonomics and user experience.
2. **Material Testing**: Further testing will be conducted to ensure that the new material used for the prism shape is durable and suitable for long-term use.
3. **User Testing**: Additional user testing will be conducted to validate the new design and gather further feedback. This will help refine the design and ensure that it meets the needs of the target audience.
4. **Production Scaling**: Once the design is finalized and tested, the production process will be scaled up to meet the demand for the new honeycomb organizer.

#### Conclusion
The 3D printed honeycomb organizer has undergone significant improvements through user testing and design challenges. The redesign of the shape from semi-cylindrical to a prism has addressed user feedback and enhanced the overall user experience. The next steps for improvement will focus on material testing, user testing, and production scaling to ensure the honeycomb organizer meets the needs of its users.

---

Thank you for your feedback and support. If you have any further suggestions or questions, please let me know.
</response>
gts:
Test

→ Demo Video

I got feedback from an in-class critique that a demo would be helpful. So, for user testing, I also prepared a demo video.

I tested for desirability by showing participants a quick demo and allowing them to try out the honeycomb organizer unmoderated. Afterwards, I asked two questions:

Is it easy to use?

Would you use it longterm?

They replied that they liked how simple and cute the design was. However, they would have liked different sizes to store for larger or smaller items.

Analysis

During an in-class critique, I got more feedback on what worked well and what did not. The shape was cute and popular. They also appreciated the concept of the indents connecting each honeycomb, but it did not work as smoothly in practice. Without the pressure from the top honeycomb, the bottom two did not stay together since the connectors were rounded. Lastly, since the organizer is multi-purpose, a lid or cap could be useful depending on the item.

Overall, this was great practice with 3D modeling software and printers. The actual prototype itself definitely needs more improvements. In the future, I will experiment with different sizes. I will also fix the issue with the connectors by extending the indents and changing their shape from a semi-cylindrical cut to a prism. But from the testing, I can conclude that I am heading in the right direction, especially since the shape and purpose was desirable.

Here’s a draft for your article on how blockchain is impacting esports:

---

**Blockchain in Esports: Ensuring Fair Play and Trust**

Blockchain technology is revolutionizing the world of esports by providing a secure and transparent platform for tournaments and player profiles. By leveraging blockchain, esports can ensure fair play and build trust among players, sponsors, and fans.

**Preventing Cheating and Manipulation**

One of the primary benefits of blockchain in esports is its ability to prevent cheating and manipulation. Each tournament can be recorded on a blockchain, ensuring that every transaction and action is transparent and immutable. This means that any attempt to cheat or manipulate the results will be easily detectable and penalized. For example, if a player tries to hack into the system to alter their performance, the blockchain will immediately flag the attempt and prevent any changes from being made.

**Securing Player Identities and Profiles**

Blockchain also plays a crucial role in securing player identities and profiles. Each player’s data, such as their performance history, achievements, and personal information, can be stored on a blockchain. This ensures that the data is secure and cannot be tampered with. Sponsors and teams can trust the data provided by players, knowing that it is accurate and reliable. For instance, if a player wants to prove their performance to a new team, they can simply share their blockchain-verified profile, which will be instantly verified by the blockchain network.

**Future Potential**

The future of blockchain in esports is promising. As the technology continues to evolve, we can expect even more innovative applications. For example, blockchain can be used to create unique in-game items and rewards that are tamper-proof and can be traded securely. This can lead to a more immersive and engaging gaming experience for players. Additionally, blockchain can help in creating a more transparent and fair system for in-game transactions, reducing the risk of fraud and ensuring that all players are treated equally.

---

I hope you find this draft helpful. Please review it and let me know if you have any feedback or if you would like me to make any changes.
</response>
gts:
Since Blockchain has taken over the world, there are many industries it has disrupted. One fine name is Esports. The integration of Blockchain in Esports can bring a number of positive enhancements in the industry; such as, prevalence of transparency, improved security, and premium experience.

Transparent Culture

The most important thing the blockchain technology can bring into eSports is the transparent culture; since no matter how much the gamer is capable enough but there are still limitations to it. Like, we still do not know how many successful gamers exist in this world. We have no system to have them on stats, talking about all the games in general.

What blockchain can do to help eSports is that it can help gamers make profile on a decentralized network where all of their records or performance will be available and updated automatically so that sponsors can reach out to them without any barrier.

High-End Security

There is significant amount of security issues in esports. Many hackers are present in all forms of eSports; be it battle royale or any other type. However, all the security concerns can be eliminated, if Blockchain applies its immutable technology into eSports. All the cheating and scams will be eradicated.

Better Experience

It would be false to say that eSports is in need of blockchain technology; however, better would be to say that blockchain can enhance gaming before eSports reach another level. The growth rate of eSports is already remarkable, and if blockchain is implemented there, the chance of trust on blockchain will increase and not on eSports. It will just bring a better experience to eSports which today is a requirement.

Future of Esports in Blockchain

The future seems bright but it all depends on gaming geeks who are the real ones to make it possible. Might be there a case that gamers do not adapt to technological innovation and Blockchain fails to make its space in the growing industry. Only time will tell what gamers adopt and what not.

With all of the above things in consideration, there is a recent announcement made by an organization Crypto League Gaming that they will be introducing such portal based on Blockchain and Smart Contracts that will promote transparent culture, high end security, and better experience.

Here’s a draft for a 500-word article about Mariana Castaño Cano’s recent podcast on climate communications:

---

**Title: Bridging Climate Science and Public Engagement: Mariana Castaño Cano’s Insights on 10 Billion Solutions and COP2021**

Mariana Castaño Cano, a prominent figure in climate communications, recently shared her expertise on a podcast discussing the critical role of bridging climate science and public engagement. Her work with 10 Billion Solutions and her insights from COP2021 highlight the importance of effective communication in addressing global climate challenges.

**10 Billion Solutions: A Bridge Between Science and Public Engagement**

10 Billion Solutions is a non-profit organization dedicated to empowering individuals and communities to take action on climate change. Mariana Castaño Cano, as the organization’s director, has been instrumental in developing innovative strategies to bridge the gap between climate science and public engagement. Her role involves translating complex scientific concepts into accessible language that can be understood by a wide audience. This approach not only increases public awareness but also encourages active participation in climate action initiatives.

**Mariana’s Expertise at COP2021**

At COP2021, Mariana Castaño Cano presented her research on the impact of climate change on vulnerable communities. Her presentation was a highlight of the conference, as she highlighted the urgent need for climate policies that are inclusive and equitable. By focusing on the human dimension of climate change, she underscored the importance of addressing social and economic inequalities to achieve sustainable development goals.

**Greenwashing: A Critical Concern**

While the focus of the article is on Mariana’s contributions, it is essential to address the issue of greenwashing. Greenwashing refers to the practice of making unsubstantiated or misleading claims about the environmental benefits of a product, service, or company. In the context of climate communications, greenwashing can undermine public trust in genuine efforts to address climate change. Mariana’s work emphasizes the need for transparent and credible communication to combat greenwashing and ensure that climate initiatives are genuinely effective.

In conclusion, Mariana Castaño Cano’s work with 10 Billion Solutions and her insights from COP2021 demonstrate the critical role of effective climate communication in bridging the gap between science and public engagement. Her efforts are crucial in fostering a more informed and engaged public, which is essential for achieving global climate goals.

---

This draft covers the main points from the podcast episode while maintaining a high level of conciseness and clarity.
</response>
gts:
Mariana Castaño Cano is a Spanish climate communications expert with plenty of experience in climate communications and journalism. She is also the founder of 10 Billion Solutions, a global, purpose driven, climate and sustainability communications agency. She joins us on the podcast to share her experiences and thoughts on climate communications. Enjoy!

Show notes:

2:18–10 Billion solutions

9:26 — Taking a comprehensive approach to both development and climate action

12:17 — Balancing time, maximizing impact, staying financially stable and maintaining mental health

16:29 — Any techniques from your time as a journalist for meeting deadlines?

18:57 — COP (conference of parties) event in 2021

24:48 — Thoughts on accountability in greenwashing

28:57 — You’ve interviewed many interesting people, do you have any in mind that are memorable or inspiring?

35:32 — How can we use strategic communications to push the needle forward for climate action?

46:06 — What are some notable changes that you’ve seen in the space of climate communications/ action over your career?

48:42 — Tell us about your home companion, your cat!

Sidharth Shukla was an Indian actor, host and model who appeared in Hindi television and films.He was known for his roles in Balika Vadhu, Broken But Beautiful 3 and Dil Se Dil Tak. He became more famous after winning the reality show Bigg Boss 13. He also emerged as a winner of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. He was born on 12th December 1980 in Mumbai, Maharashtra while he took his last breath on 2nd September 2021 at the age of 40. He died of heart attack , saddening all his fans and loved ones. His death came as a shock for the whole nation. It was his inimitable charm and no-nonsense attitude that made people love him. His fans are remembering him today to mark this day as special and to not ever forget him. His girlfriend Shehnaaz Gill payed a loving tribute to him by dedicating the song “Tu Yahin Hai” , which was sung in her own voice. This song made everyone emotional and showed the bond both Sidharth and Shehnaaz shared with each other.

Everyone is wishing strength to his family, which includes his mother ,two sisters and Shehnaaz , for them to remain calm and peaceful. We hope he is at peace wherever he is. Wishing him all goodness and prayers.

**Title: Launching a Comprehensive Bug Bounty Program for Blockchain Security**

At [Company Name], we are excited to announce the launch of our new bug bounty program, designed to ensure the security and integrity of our blockchain infrastructure. Our program is open to all security researchers and enthusiasts who are passionate about blockchain technology and committed to finding and reporting vulnerabilities.

### Scope of the Program

Our bug bounty program covers a wide range of areas, including smart contracts, web applications, and mobile apps. Submissions are handled directly via Immunefi’s platform, ensuring a seamless and efficient process. We appreciate the diverse skill sets of our community and do not prioritize specific vulnerability types; instead, we focus on the severity classification of each reported issue.

### Submission Process

To participate, simply submit your findings through Immunefi’s platform. Our team will review each submission based on its severity and provide feedback promptly. We value transparency and will communicate the status of your report regularly. If your report is accepted, you will be eligible for rewards based on the severity of the vulnerability.

### Community-Driven Approach

We believe in fostering a collaborative and inclusive community. Our program aims to encourage researchers to share their knowledge and expertise, helping to build a stronger and more secure blockchain ecosystem. We will also host regular webinars and workshops to educate the community about blockchain security best practices and emerging threats.

### Rewards and Recognition

For each reported vulnerability, we offer competitive rewards based on its severity. We also provide recognition through our blog and social media channels, highlighting the contributions of our researchers. Additionally, we will consider long-term collaborations with top researchers who demonstrate exceptional skills and dedication.

### Conclusion

Join us in our mission to make blockchain technology more secure and accessible. Your contributions are invaluable, and we look forward to working with you to protect the future of blockchain.

---

Feel free to review and make any necessary adjustments. We are here to help and can provide more details if needed.
</response>

---

**Title: Leveraging ERP Software for Enhanced Production Planning and Quality Control in the Food and Beverage Industry**

**Introduction:**
In the food and beverage industry, efficient production planning and quality control are crucial for maintaining a competitive edge. Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software plays a pivotal role in streamlining these processes, enabling organizations to optimize resource allocation, reduce waste, and ensure product consistency. This article explores how ERP software can be effectively utilized to enhance production planning and quality control in the food and beverage sector.

**1. Production Planning:**
ERP software offers robust tools for production planning, allowing manufacturers to forecast demand, manage inventory, and schedule production activities. By integrating data from various sources such as sales forecasts, supplier lead times, and production capacity, ERP systems can generate accurate production plans that align with business objectives. For instance, the ERP system can automatically adjust production schedules based on real-time demand fluctuations, ensuring that the right products are produced at the right time.

**2. Quality Control:**
Quality control is a critical aspect of food and beverage manufacturing, and ERP software can significantly improve the quality assurance process. By implementing quality management systems within the ERP framework, manufacturers can monitor and control the quality of raw materials, intermediate products, and finished goods. ERP systems can track the entire production process, from raw material receipt to final product release, ensuring compliance with industry standards and customer expectations. Additionally, ERP software can facilitate the implementation of Six Sigma methodologies, enabling organizations to identify and eliminate defects at the source.

**3. Process Manufacturing Steps:**
ERP software supports various process manufacturing steps, including scheduling, quality measures, line configuration, real-time Operational Excellence (OEE), and analytics. Here’s a detailed breakdown of how these steps are addressed in the article:

- **Scheduling:** ERP systems can automate the scheduling process, taking into account factors such as production capacity, resource availability, and demand forecasts. This ensures that production activities are optimized and resources are used efficiently.
- **Quality Measures:** ERP software can integrate quality control measures, enabling real-time monitoring of product quality. By tracking key performance indicators (KPIs) such as defect rates, yield, and customer satisfaction, manufacturers can identify areas for improvement and take corrective actions.
- **Line Configuration:** ERP systems can facilitate the configuration of production lines, allowing manufacturers to optimize the layout and equipment for specific production tasks. This ensures that the production process is streamlined and efficient.
- **Real-time OEE:** ERP software can monitor and track the performance of production lines in real-time, providing insights into factors that affect OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness). By analyzing data such as downtime, maintenance, and speed, manufacturers can identify opportunities for improvement and optimize production processes.
- **Analytics:** ERP systems can generate valuable insights through advanced analytics, enabling manufacturers to make data-driven decisions. By analyzing historical data, manufacturers can identify trends, predict future performance, and optimize resource allocation.

**Conclusion:**
ERP software is a powerful tool for enhancing production planning and quality control in the food and beverage industry. By leveraging the capabilities of ERP systems, manufacturers can streamline their operations, improve efficiency, and ensure product consistency. **WhatsApp’s New Crypto Payment Feature: A Pilot in the US and the Novi Wallet**

WhatsApp has introduced a new crypto payment feature, which includes a pilot program in the US and the launch of the Novi wallet. This feature allows users to send and receive payments using cryptocurrencies without the need for fiat conversion. The key features of this feature are no transfer fees and a ‘click-to-pay’ process.

**Pilot Program in the US**

WhatsApp has launched a pilot program in the US to test the new crypto payment feature. The pilot program is designed to gather feedback from users and ensure the feature is functioning smoothly. The pilot program is currently open to a select group of users and will be expanded in the future.

**Novi Wallet**

The Novi wallet is the official wallet for the WhatsApp crypto payment feature. The Novi wallet allows users to store, send, and receive cryptocurrencies. The wallet is secure and easy to use, with a user-friendly interface. Users can easily transfer funds between their Novi wallet and their bank account or credit card.

**No Transfer Fees**

One of the key features of the WhatsApp crypto payment feature is the absence of transfer fees. Users can send and receive payments using cryptocurrencies without incurring any fees. This makes the feature more accessible to a wider range of users, as it eliminates the need for users to pay for the transaction.

**Click-to-Pay Process**

The ‘click-to-pay’ process is a simple and intuitive way to send and receive payments using cryptocurrencies. Users can send payments by clicking on a link, which will automatically initiate the payment process. The recipient can then click on the link to receive the payment. This process is fast and secure, ensuring that users can send and receive payments quickly and easily.

---

WhatsApp messenger tests cryptocurrency transactions. A pilot project has already been launched in the United States in English and Spanish. The operations are processed by the Meta — Novi digital wallet. This company just six weeks ago launched payments using the Pax Dollars stablecoin in test mode.

Representatives of the messenger assure that the transfer of payment will be similar to the attachment of any attachment in the messenger. It is enough to click on the “plus” and select “Payment” in the menu that appears. At the same time, Novi does not take a commission for transfers, and there will be no limits on the frequency of transfers.

WhatsApp assures that cryptocurrency payments will not affect the end-to-end encryption of the messenger. Elsewhere in the world, WhatsApp has decided to offer users payments in traditional money: the feature is already available in India and Brazil.

Stephane Kasriel on twitter:

“We often hear that people use WhatsApp to coordinate sending money to loved ones, and Novi enables people to do that securely, instantly and with no fees. Payments will appear directly in people’s chat.”

Meta, previously known as Facebook, has been working on the implementation of cryptocurrency payments inside of its apps for a long time after dropping its plans for the creation of its own digital currency due to regulatory concerns.

**Enhancing Bedroom Decor with Bedside Tables: A Modern and Elegant Guide**

Bedside tables are more than just functional pieces; they are the perfect blend of form and function, enhancing the aesthetic of any bedroom. In this article, we will explore how bedside tables can elevate your bedroom decor, focusing on a specific example: the Kyoto Bedside Table from Orange Tree, and the importance of regional craftsmanship.

### Modern and Elegant Bedside Tables

Bedside tables are essential in any bedroom, serving as a focal point for your nightstand. They come in various styles, from minimalist to ornate, and can be a great way to add a touch of elegance to your space. A well-chosen bedside table can transform a simple bedroom into a luxurious retreat.

### The Kyoto Bedside Table from Orange Tree

One standout example of a modern and elegant bedside table is the Kyoto Bedside Table from Orange Tree. This table is a perfect blend of contemporary design and timeless beauty. Its sleek lines and minimalist aesthetic make it a versatile addition to any bedroom. The Kyoto Bedside Table is crafted from high-quality materials, ensuring durability and longevity.

### Elevating Aesthetic with Regional Design

One of the key factors in enhancing the aesthetic of your bedroom is the use of regional design elements. For instance, the Kyoto Bedside Table from Orange Tree is made using Indian craftsmanship. Indian artisans are renowned for their intricate and detailed work, which adds a unique touch to the table. The craftsmanship is evident in the intricate carvings and the attention to detail, making the table a true work of art.

### Creative Ideas for Using Bedside Tables

Here are some creative ideas for using bedside tables to enhance your bedroom decor:

1. **Layered Nightstands**: Combine multiple bedside tables to create a layered look. This can add depth and interest to your space, making it feel more dynamic and inviting.

2. **Multi-functional Tables**: Choose a bedside table that serves multiple purposes. For example, a table with drawers can be used for storing books, electronics, and other items, keeping your nightstand clutter-free.

3. **Personalized Decor**: Add personal touches to your bedside table. This could be a family photo, a favorite book, or a small vase of flowers. These items can make the table feel more personal and special.

4. **Lighting Options**: Consider adding lighting to your bedside table. A bedside lamp or a small table lamp can provide ambient light, making it easier to read in the evening.

5. **Storage Solutions**: Use your bedside table as a storage solution. Add shelves or drawers to keep your nightstand organized and clutter-free. This can also be a great way to display decorative items.

### Conclusion

In conclusion, bedside tables are not just functional pieces; they are a reflection of your personal style and taste. By choosing a bedside table that aligns with your aesthetic preferences and incorporating regional design elements, you can create a bedroom that is both modern and elegant. The Kyoto Bedside Table from Orange Tree is a great example of how a well-crafted bedside table can elevate your bedroom decor.

---

**Follow-up Question:**

Could you elaborate on how the Kyoto Bedside Table’s Indian craftsmanship can specifically enhance the bedroom decor, and perhaps suggest other regional designs that could complement it?
</response>

Here are some basic makeup tips for dusky skin tones:

1. **Foundation**: Choose a foundation that matches your natural skin tone. Opt for a shade that is slightly lighter than your natural skin tone to create a natural-looking glow. Apply it evenly with a brush or a sponge to avoid any harsh lines.

2. **Concealer**: Use a concealer to cover any blemishes or dark circles. Apply it under your eyes and along the sides of your nose and chin. Blend it well to ensure a seamless look.

3. **Blush**: Apply a light blush to the apples of your cheeks. Choose a shade that complements your skin tone. A soft pink or peachy color works well. Use a fluffy brush to apply and blend it gently.

4. **Eyelids**: For dusky skin tones, a subtle eyeshadow palette can enhance your features. Start with a light brown or taupe shade on the lid and blend it outwards. Add a pop of color on the inner corner with a shimmery shade like gold or rose gold. Finish with a clear or slightly shimmery eyeliner to define your eyes.

5. **Lip Shades**: Opt for lip colors that are not too bold but still make a statement. A nude or light pink lipstick can complement dusky skin tones beautifully. You can also add a touch of gloss to make your lips look more vibrant.

Remember to apply these steps in a simple and straightforward manner to achieve a natural look. Enjoy your makeup session!
</response>

Photo by Amir Seilsepour on Unsplash

Dusky or Tanned skin has become the desire for many Americans. Not black-brown but a little darker than whitish skin tone. While every skin has its own beauty and glow. To categorize shades of color and makeup ideas, each skin color has attribute a name. Like The dusky tone. Remember there is nothing comparable when the skin is healthy and glowing.

To keep your skin accentuating and glowing, here are some makeup tips to consider to make a good change. Herbeautysecret has been showing some of the best ways to elevate the beauty with regular skin care tips

Photo by Jazmin Quaynor on Unsplash

Foundation

Foundation is the base of any makeup. And for dusky tone, it requires a little extra effort to find the right shade according to their skin tone. Never choose a shade lighter than your natural skin tone, it will make your skin look patch and dull. Foundation is used to create an even base not for brightening.

Concealer

Go for concealer and bronzers too. Add them in your makeup routine, to hide blemishes and highlight the face features. Carry out yourself with pride!

Blush

Its a myth that dusky tone should stay away from blush. Never skip it. Instead use some shades like rose, deep orange and coral. Try to avoid shades like brown and beige, as they won’t suit you. With Dusky tones you have to be a little careful with color choices.

Glossy Eyelids

The best way to highlight your eyes is to use glossy eyelids. Use a cream based eye shadow on your lids in coral, brown, or rose gold shade that will bring out the beauty of your beautiful dark eyes.

Lip Shade

When you choose your lipstick, look for deep and dark colors. The most suited colors like plum, maroon, burgundy and berry goes well with dusky complexion. If you like wearing nude shades, choose one that matches your skin tone. Too light a shade can make your face appear washed-out.

How do you achieve this in a way that doesn’t have you pulling your hair out and losing sleep?

The answer: Reposite’s new Trips marketplace

Travel & event planners responsible for crafting custom & tailored itineraries can leverage the Reposite Trips Marketplace to create listings for each part of the itinerary that they need new suppliers. For example — if you’re pulling together a 9 day custom itinerary for a group of 20 people in New York, but need ideas for dinner venues on the 6th night and group activities on the final day, you could create listings for each of these needs, and get matched with quality suppliers within just a few hours.

Once a listing is published, (whether for a hotel, transportation company, venue, activity, tour guide etc.) all of the matching suppliers within the Reposite network are notified of the need and are able to login and proactively submit their proposal and pricing for the given trip. This enables travel professionals to pick from multiple options, receive competitive pricing quickly, and keep proposals fresh.

Here’s a draft article that includes the requested content:

---

**Staying Inspired When Facing Self-Doubt**

Self-doubt can be a common obstacle when pursuing your goals, especially when you’re facing challenges like public speaking. Martin Luther King Jr. once said, “The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends toward justice,” and Theodore Roosevelt’s quote, “Believe you can and you’re halfway there,” can serve as powerful reminders during moments of self-doubt. In this article, we’ll explore how to stay inspired and build confidence, drawing from personal experiences and real-world examples.

### Overcoming Stage Fear: A Personal Example

A few years ago, I was tasked with giving a presentation at a major conference. The thought of standing in front of hundreds of people was terrifying. I had never given a speech in front of a large audience before, and the fear of making a mistake was overwhelming. However, I knew that the content was important, and I wanted to share it with the world. Here’s how I overcame my stage fear:

1. **Preparation**: I spent weeks preparing for the presentation. I researched the topic thoroughly, practiced my delivery multiple times, and even recorded myself to identify areas for improvement. This preparation gave me the confidence to feel prepared and ready.

2. **Visualization**: Before the presentation, I visualized myself delivering the speech successfully. I imagined the audience listening intently, nodding in agreement, and applauding at the end. This mental rehearsal helped me feel more comfortable and confident.

3. **Breathing Techniques**: I practiced deep breathing exercises to calm my nerves. Taking slow, deep breaths helped me manage my anxiety and stay focused.

4. **Positive Affirmations**: I repeated positive affirmations to myself, such as “I am capable,” “I am prepared,” and “I can do this.” These affirmations helped reinforce my belief in my abilities.

5. **Support System**: I had a supportive team behind me. My colleagues helped me with the content, and my friends and family offered encouragement. Knowing that I had a strong support system made me feel more secure.

6. **Facing the Fear**: On the day of the presentation, I took a deep breath and stepped onto the stage. I focused on my preparation and the positive outcomes I wanted to achieve. I reminded myself of the impact my message could have on the audience. As I began speaking, I felt a surge of confidence and enthusiasm.

### Inspiring Others: Fueling Your Own Motivation

Inspiring others can be a powerful way to fuel your own motivation. When you solve real-world problems, you not only help others but also gain a sense of accomplishment and purpose. Here are a few examples of how inspiring others can boost your own confidence:

1. **Community Impact**: Imagine you’re working on a project to improve access to clean water in a developing country. By solving this problem, you’re not only helping those in need but also contributing to a more equitable world. The sense of pride and satisfaction you feel from making a tangible difference can be incredibly motivating.

2. **Personal Growth**: When you help others, you often learn new skills and gain valuable experience. Solving problems can be challenging, but the process of overcoming obstacles and finding solutions can be incredibly rewarding. This growth can translate into increased confidence in your own abilities.

3. **Recognition and Validation**: When you see the positive impact of your work, you’re likely to receive recognition and validation from others. This can be a powerful motivator and a source of encouragement. Knowing that your efforts are making a difference can boost your self-esteem and inspire you to continue striving for excellence.

By combining these strategies—preparation, visualization, breathing techniques, positive affirmations, and support systems—you can overcome self-doubt and build the confidence needed to tackle challenges. Remember, the arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends toward justice. By staying inspired and making a positive impact, you can help shape a better world for everyone.

---

This article includes the requested Martin Luther King Jr. and Theodore Roosevelt quotes, along with a personal example and a paragraph about inspiring others. It should be under 500 words and provide practical tips for building confidence.
</response>

Here’s a concise article about when Bitcoin mining will end based on the 18.89 million figure (90% of 21 million) and the upcoming halving event in 2024:

---

### When Will Bitcoin Mining End?

Bitcoin mining is a crucial process that secures the Bitcoin network and generates new Bitcoin tokens. As of now, the total supply of Bitcoin is capped at 21 million, and mining will continue until this cap is reached. Given that the current total mined Bitcoin is approximately 18.89 million (90% of 21 million), there are about 2.11 million Bitcoin left to be mined.

The process of mining involves solving complex mathematical problems to validate transactions and add them to the blockchain. As the network grows and the difficulty of these problems increases, the rewards for miners decrease. This is where the concept of halving comes into play. Every 210,000 blocks (approximately every four years), the block reward is cut in half. This halving event has already occurred three times, reducing the block reward from 50 Bitcoin to 25 Bitcoin in 2012, to 12.5 Bitcoin in 2016, and to 6.25 Bitcoin in 2020.

The next halving event is scheduled for 2024, when the block reward will be reduced to 3.125 Bitcoin. This reduction in rewards will continue to decrease over time, making mining less profitable for individual miners. However, the network will still be secure as long as there are enough miners contributing to the network's security.

### Post-Halving and Beyond

After the halving event in 2024, the block reward will continue to decrease, but the network will still rely on miners to validate transactions and secure the blockchain. As mining becomes less profitable, the network will transition to a proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, which does not require the same level of computational power. This shift is expected to occur in the future, but the exact timeline is uncertain.

In the meantime, miners will continue to rely on transaction fees to generate revenue. As the network grows and more transactions are processed, the fees will likely increase, providing a more stable income for miners. However, the profitability of mining will continue to decline, and the transition to PoS will be a significant change for the Bitcoin ecosystem.

### Conclusion

While the exact end date of Bitcoin mining is uncertain, it is clear that the process will continue until the 21 million cap is reached. The upcoming halving event in 2024 will significantly impact the profitability of mining, but the network will remain secure as long as there are enough miners contributing to its security. The transition to a proof-of-stake mechanism is expected to occur in the future, but the exact timeline is uncertain.

---

This article covers the key points about the end of Bitcoin mining and the impact of halving events, staying within the 500-word limit.
</response>
gts:
Photo by André François McKenzie on Unsplash

Recently, the cryptocurrency Bitcoin reached 90 percent of its maximum offer. A study conducted by blockchain.com revealed that of the total distribution of 21 million Bitcoins, 18.89 million have already been mined and distributed to the market. The milestone comes almost 12 years after the first block, which consisted of 50 Bitcoins, was dug on January 9, 2009.

Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto has set the value of Bitcoin at 21 million, making cryptocurrency scarce for controlling inflation that may result from the unlimited supply. Bitcoin is “mined” by miners who solve math problems to verify and validate the transaction block that takes place on its network. It is a process of adding new Bitcoins to the stream. After making a successful transaction set, the miner is rewarded with a Bitcoins block.

It should be noted that every four years the value of Bitcoin mining is being halved. So, when Nakamoto created Bitcoin, the reward for securing a block of transactions was 50 Bitcoins. In 2012- 25 Bitcoins and dropped to 12.5 in 2016 and by the end of 2024 miners are expected to earn only 1.56 Bitcoins. This process is called splitting and will continue until the last Bitcoin is mined.

It may seem that the world’s most popular cryptocurrency is on the verge of collapse, but from the halving schedules, it is predicted that the remaining 10 percent of bitcoins will continue until February 2140, according to blockchain.com.

After reaching 21 million, Bitcoin will be very scarce and miners will rely on transaction funds, instead of block earnings. Miners will start to earn more from the transactions that take place on these blockchains than the mines themselves.

It is noteworthy that Bitcoin is not just a cryptocurrency, but a blockchain network that processes transactions in a distributed platform. Therefore, has a lot more to use than just a crypto asset.

One of the key highlights of AE Sleepy’s journey is his Platinum 2 calibration. This achievement is a testament to his dedication and hard work. AE Sleepy’s journey is a true underdog story, and it serves as a reminder that with dedication and hard work, anything is possible. I streamed VALORANT non-stop since June 2nd 2020. In the 5 months since its release I prolly took a total of 5 days off. It was insane. I’d grind unrated. Then ranked got released and I stayed up till 5am just to be one of the first players to experience ranked. It was hell.

I calibrated Platinum 2. I think. I was determined to become the first Radiant in my region. Obviously that didn’t happen, but as I was grinding with ApexSG and anobrain I found this sort of new love for the game.

It was just… fun.

Playing every single day for 3 months straight I was bound to regain my long lost CS skills. I had made a reputation for myself as a Reyna abuser. No, THE Reyna abuser. The whole country would be like “oh shit it’s the Reyna abuser…” when they see me in their game, but anytime I play something like Omen or Jett, they’d see me as a boosted Immortal.

Apparently that was enough for some of the pro teams to consider me. Specifically two teams, whom each had an underaged player that couldn’t participate in the very first official VALORANT tournament by Riot Games. These two teams had approached me and asked me to stand in for them, and that was when my competitive spirit that I had buried since I was forced into early retirement resurfaced.

Here’s a draft of your short article about dental X-rays:

---

**What Are Dental X-Rays?**

Dental X-rays are a crucial diagnostic tool used by dentists to examine the health of your teeth, gums, and jaw. These images help dentists detect cavities, diagnose tooth decay, and identify other issues that might not be visible during a regular check-up. X-rays are particularly useful for spotting problems like impacted teeth, bone loss, and infections that can affect your overall oral health.

**How Do Dental X-Rays Work?**

Dental X-rays use a small amount of radiation to create images of your teeth and jaw. The dentist or dental hygienist will place a protective lead apron over your abdomen to shield you from the radiation. A special X-ray machine then emits a beam of radiation that passes through your teeth and jaw, creating an image on a digital sensor or film. The image is then processed and displayed on a computer screen or printed out for your dentist to review.

**Why Are Dental X-Rays Important?**

Regular dental X-rays are essential for maintaining good oral health. They help dentists catch problems early, which can prevent more serious issues from developing. For example, X-rays can reveal cavities that are too small to be seen with the naked eye, allowing dentists to treat them before they become larger and more difficult to manage. Additionally, X-rays can help identify signs of gum disease, tooth decay, and other conditions that can lead to tooth loss if left untreated.

**Safety Concerns**

While dental X-rays do involve a small amount of radiation, the risk to your health is extremely low. Modern dental X-ray machines are designed to minimize radiation exposure, and the benefits of regular X-rays far outweigh the risks. For children and pregnant patients, it’s especially important to ensure that the radiation dose is kept as low as possible. Digital X-rays are generally considered safer than traditional X-rays because they use less radiation and produce clearer images. However, if you are pregnant or have a history of radiation sensitivity, it’s important to discuss any concerns with your dentist.

**Myth Busting: X-Rays for Kids**

One common myth is that kids don’t need regular dental X-rays. This is not true. Children’s teeth are more susceptible to decay and cavities, and X-rays can help dentists detect problems early. For example, X-rays can reveal cavities that are too small to be seen with the naked eye, allowing dentists to treat them before they become larger and more difficult to manage. Regular X-rays are also important for monitoring the growth and development of your child’s teeth and jaw.

---

Feel free to share this article with your friends and family to help them understand the importance of dental X-rays. If you have any questions or concerns, don’t hesitate to reach out to your dentist.
</response>

How Does a Dental X-ray Work?

Dental X-Ray is often conducted during routine visits where it shows the crown portion of your teeth and finds out if any signs of decay. To conduct this X-Ray, a patient is asked to place a plate in between their teeth where the machine will be placed on either side of your face.

Secondly, Panoramic x-rays are also a part of dental health treatment. It is taken from the outside of your mouth that gives a bigger and clear picture of the oral cavity. It also includes pictures of the sinus area and jawbones to check if there’s any oral disorder.

Most importantly, these X Rays are safe and emit quite a lower level of radiation.

**Engage-to-Earn (E2E) vs. Play-to-Earn (P2E): A Comparative Analysis**

In the world of blockchain gaming, two popular models have emerged: Play-to-Earn (P2E) and Engage-to-Earn (E2E). While both models leverage blockchain technology to reward players for their engagement, they differ significantly in their approach and potential for earning rewards. This article will explore the key differences between E2E and P2E, focusing on the MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration and the unique opportunities offered by E2E.

**P2E: The Classic Model**

Play-to-Earn is the more traditional model, where players earn tokens or rewards by simply playing the game. In P2E, the primary focus is on gameplay, and players are rewarded for their time and effort spent within the game. For example, in the popular game Axie Infinity, players can earn AXS tokens by participating in battles, completing quests, and engaging in various in-game activities. The rewards are typically based on the player's performance and engagement, making P2E a straightforward and accessible model for new players.

**E2E: The Engaging Model**

Engage-to-Earn, on the other hand, is a more sophisticated approach that emphasizes player engagement and interaction. In E2E games, players are rewarded not just for playing but for actively engaging with the game's ecosystem. This model often involves deeper gameplay mechanics, such as exploring new areas, completing complex quests, and participating in community-driven events. For instance, in the MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration, players can earn MHIVE tokens by exploring VISHV Space via the portal. This not only rewards players for their time but also encourages them to engage with the game's broader ecosystem.

**MetaHIVE-VISHV Collaboration: A Case Study**

The MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration is a prime example of how E2E can be implemented in a blockchain game. In this collaboration, players can earn MHIVE tokens by exploring VISHV Space via the portal. This not only rewards players for their time but also encourages them to engage with the game's broader ecosystem. For example, players can earn MHIVE tokens by completing specific tasks, such as exploring new areas, discovering hidden treasures, and participating in community-driven events. This approach not only rewards players for their engagement but also fosters a sense of community and collaboration within the game.

**Key Differences**

1. **Focus on Engagement**: E2E games place a greater emphasis on player engagement and interaction, while P2E games focus more on gameplay and performance.
2. **Reward Mechanisms**: E2E games often reward players for exploring new areas, completing complex quests, and participating in community-driven events, while P2E games typically reward players for their performance and engagement within the game.
3. **Ecosystem Integration**: E2E games integrate the game's ecosystem more deeply, allowing players to earn rewards for their engagement with the broader game world, while P2E games often focus on individual gameplay mechanics.

**Conclusion**

Engage-to-Earn (E2E) offers a more engaging and rewarding experience for players, as it emphasizes player engagement and interaction within the game's ecosystem. The MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration is a prime example of how E2E can be implemented in a blockchain game, offering players the opportunity to earn MHIVE tokens by exploring VISHV Space via the portal. By focusing on player engagement and interaction, E2E games can provide a more immersive and rewarding experience for players, making them a valuable addition to the blockchain gaming landscape.

It’s hard to even start this text about my first impressions as I have a lot of them.

A lot of good impressions.

Since I arrived, I was always in motion, doing something, going somewhere, meeting someone. I didn’t have much time alone reminiscing and recollecting my thoughts.

Now after a week I’m settling down a bit and soon I’ll be writing and posting more texts and stories of my life here in Brazil.

My goal is to write a text every week about my Brazilian experience. I’ll be doing my best to overcome my shyness, in order to write, to record and to share my life with anyone who might be interested.

This is what it all started…

First of all I can’t even begin to express my gratitude to the amazing people from @keric_cadca, @associazioneinco, @avesol.associacao and @icyebrasil for allowing me to get this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

I feel truly blessed and thankful that I am able to go for this exchange and work on Globers Project financed by the Erasmus+ program of the European Union and call Brazil, this spectacular country, my home for the next 12 months.

---

**How Businesses Can Speed Up Their Accounting Processes with Software Solutions**

In today's fast-paced business environment, efficient accounting processes are crucial for maintaining profitability and staying ahead of competitors. One of the key areas where businesses can significantly improve their operations is through the adoption of advanced software solutions designed to streamline accounting tasks. In this article, we will explore various software tools and discuss how they can help businesses enhance their accounting processes.

One such tool that stands out is **Ola Books**, a comprehensive accounting software designed to automate and simplify numerous accounting tasks. Ola Books offers a range of features that can help businesses manage their finances more effectively. Here are some of the ways Ola Books can help speed up your accounting processes:

1. **Automated Invoicing**: With Ola Books, businesses can easily generate and send invoices to customers. The software integrates seamlessly with popular payment gateways, ensuring that payments are received promptly. This automation saves time that would otherwise be spent manually creating and sending invoices.

2. **Real-Time Tracking of Unpaid Invoices**: Ola Books provides real-time visibility into unpaid invoices, allowing businesses to quickly identify and address any outstanding payments. This feature helps prevent late fees and ensures that cash flow remains healthy. The software also sends reminders to customers who have not yet paid their invoices, ensuring that overdue payments are collected efficiently.

3. **Mobile App Integration**: Ola Books offers a mobile app that allows users to access their accounting data on the go. This feature is particularly useful for businesses with remote employees or those who frequently travel. The mobile app enables users to send invoices, track unpaid invoices, and perform other accounting tasks from anywhere, at any time.

4. **Efficient Reporting and Analytics**: Ola Books provides robust reporting and analytics tools that help businesses make informed decisions. With detailed financial reports at their fingertips, managers can quickly identify trends, forecast future expenses, and optimize their budgeting processes. This level of insight can help businesses make data-driven decisions and improve overall financial performance.

By leveraging the features of Ola Books, businesses can significantly reduce the time and effort required to manage their accounting processes. The software’s automation capabilities, real-time tracking, and mobile app integration make it an ideal solution for businesses looking to streamline their accounting workflows.

For more information and to switch to Ola Books, please visit [Ola Books](https://www.ola-books.com).

---

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further assistance.

Here’s a concise article about common workout mistakes people make:

### Common Workout Mistakes to Avoid

Workout sessions are supposed to be a way to improve your health and fitness, but if you’re not careful, you might end up making some common mistakes that can hinder your progress. Here are some of the most frequent errors people make during their workouts, along with tips to avoid them.

#### 1. Ignoring Progress Tracking
Tracking your progress is crucial for staying motivated and seeing improvements. Without a clear understanding of your current fitness level and goals, it can be challenging to make meaningful progress. Make sure to keep a workout log, record your weights, and track your performance metrics like reps, sets, and time. This will help you identify areas where you need to improve and celebrate your successes.

#### 2. Overeating Before Workouts
Eating a large meal before a workout can lead to discomfort and reduced performance. Your body needs energy, but consuming too much food can cause digestive issues and make it harder to focus during your workout. Aim to eat a light, balanced meal about 2-3 hours before your session. Opt for foods that are easy to digest, such as fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins. Hydrate adequately before and after your workout to ensure you have the necessary fluids.

#### 3. Proper Hydration (Not Too Much)
Staying hydrated is essential for optimal performance and recovery. Dehydration can lead to fatigue, decreased endurance, and even heat exhaustion. However, drinking too much water can also be harmful. Aim to drink about 17-20 ounces of water 2-3 hours before your workout and another 8 ounces 10-20 minutes before starting. During your workout, aim to drink about 7-10 ounces of water every 10-20 minutes. Listen to your body and adjust your fluid intake based on your sweat rate and the intensity of your workout.

#### 4. No Alcohol
Alcohol can have a negative impact on your workout performance and recovery. It can interfere with your sleep, reduce your energy levels, and affect your coordination and balance. If you do choose to drink, make sure to have a designated workout day and avoid alcohol for at least 24 hours before your session. This will help you feel more alert and focused during your workout.

#### 5. Posture
Maintaining good posture is crucial for injury prevention and optimal performance. Poor posture can lead to muscle imbalances, joint pain, and reduced range of motion. Pay attention to your form during exercises, especially when using weights. Keep your core engaged, maintain a neutral spine, and avoid hunching your shoulders or rounding your back. If you’re unsure about your posture, consider working with a fitness professional who can provide personalized guidance.

#### 6. Not Working Out on an Empty Stomach
Eating a meal or snack before your workout can help fuel your body and improve performance. Skipping breakfast or a pre-workout snack can lead to low blood sugar, which can cause fatigue and decreased endurance. Aim to eat a balanced meal or snack about 1-2 hours before your workout. Good options include a protein shake, a piece of fruit, or a small bowl of oatmeal. This will provide your body with the necessary energy to power through your session.

#### 7. Stretching
Incorporating stretching into your warm-up and cool-down routines is essential for injury prevention and muscle recovery. Stretching helps improve flexibility, reduce muscle tension, and enhance overall mobility. Spend 5-10 minutes at the beginning and end of your workout to perform dynamic stretches (like leg swings and arm circles) and static stretches (like hamstring and quad stretches). This will help you feel more relaxed and prepared for your workout.

By avoiding these common mistakes, you can optimize your workout routine and achieve your fitness goals. Remember to track your progress, stay hydrated, maintain good posture, and listen to your body. Happy exercising!
</response>

**Behind-the-Scenes of China’s Singles’ Day: Handling Logistics and Consumer Frenzy**

China’s Singles’ Day, also known as “Double Eleven,” is one of the world’s largest online shopping events, with a massive consumer frenzy and significant logistical challenges. In 2020, the event saw sales of $115 billion, marking a significant increase from the previous year. Platforms like Taobao and JD.com played a crucial role in facilitating this massive sales event.

One of the standout features of Singles’ Day is the participation of 382 brands, each achieving sales of over $15 million. This highlights the event’s ability to attract a wide range of consumers and brands. However, the event also faced scrutiny for its emphasis on lavish spending, leading to a crackdown on excessive consumption.

Despite these challenges, Singles’ Day continues to be a pivotal moment for both consumers and businesses. The event showcases the innovative logistics solutions employed by e-commerce giants to manage the massive volume of orders. For instance, Taobao and JD.com have implemented advanced technologies such as AI and big data analytics to optimize inventory management and delivery processes.

In conclusion, Singles’ Day is a testament to China’s thriving e-commerce sector and the innovative strategies employed by businesses to handle the logistics and consumer frenzy. The event’s success is a result of the collaboration between consumers, businesses, and logistics providers, and it continues to be a significant milestone in the global retail landscape.

Singles’ Day is China’s spending event of the year, with sales reaching a record $115 billion in 2020.

As consumers shop, ecommerce employees and delivery companies work overtime to keep the spree going.

Distribution centers bear the brunt of the workload and have to move billions of packages in days.

Singles’ Day proper started in China on Thursday, marking the beginning of the country’s largest online spending fest.

While this year’s event included a discount period on November 1, the true 24-hour sales frenzy traditionally launches on November 11, when consumers flood online shopping platforms like Alibaba’s Taobao and its rival JD.com.

Despite a crackdown this year from Beijing on lavish spending and consumer waste, reports creeping in from local media indicate Singles’ Day is still going strong, with 382 brands each hitting $15 million in sales since the start of this year’s event.

Here are some photos that show how China moves billions of packages to hundreds of cities on its biggest spending day.

**Title: StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Title Generator: A Powerful Tool for Content Creators**

StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Title Generator is a game-changer for anyone looking to create engaging and effective video titles. In this article, we’ll explore how the tool works, why good titles matter, and how it saves time. We’ll also highlight the importance of the ‘Get started for free’ offer and the AI’s GPT-3 training to ensure high-quality suggestions.

### How It Works

StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Title Generator uses advanced algorithms and machine learning to create compelling titles based on your video’s content. By analyzing keywords, trending topics, and user behavior, the tool generates titles that are likely to perform well on YouTube. The process is straightforward: simply input your video’s title or description, and the generator will produce a list of suggested titles.

### Why Good Titles Matter

In the competitive world of YouTube, a great title can make all the difference. Titles are the first thing viewers see, and they play a crucial role in capturing their attention and encouraging them to watch your video. A well-crafted title can increase your video’s visibility, drive more views, and even boost your channel’s overall performance. By using the StoryLab.ai YouTube Title Generator, you can ensure that your titles are optimized for YouTube’s algorithm, increasing the chances of your video being discovered by a wider audience.

### How It Saves Time

Creating engaging titles can be time-consuming, especially if you’re juggling multiple videos. That’s where StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Title Generator comes in. The tool automates the title creation process, saving you hours of manual effort. With just a few clicks, you can generate a list of high-quality titles that are tailored to your video’s content. This allows you to focus on other important aspects of your content creation, such as scriptwriting, filming, and editing.

### Get Started for Free

Ready to start using StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Title Generator? Sign up for a free account today and get started with the tool. No credit card required, and you can try it out without any obligations. Once you’re signed up, you can access the generator and start creating titles for your videos.

### GPT-3 Training Ensures Quality Suggestions

At the heart of StoryLab.ai’s YouTube Title Generator is its advanced AI, which is trained on the latest GPT-3 technology. GPT-3 is a state-of-the-art language model developed by OpenAI, known for its ability to generate human-like text. By leveraging GPT-3’s capabilities, the generator can produce titles that are not only catchy but also relevant to your video’s content. This ensures that the titles you create are not only engaging but also aligned with your audience’s interests.

---

Let me know if you’re happy with this draft or if you’d like to make any further changes!
</response>
